wiki_section_title: Teams

wiki_section_text: Alianza AtléticoTorinoLa LoretanaUnión MinasPesqueroJosé GálvezCiencianoMelgar Alianza LimaAlcides VigoMunicipalSporting Cristal Universitario Sport Boys Locations of the 1997 Primera División teams

intro: The 1997 Torneo Descentralizado was the 82nd season of the top category of Peruvian football (soccer). It was played by 14 teams. The national champion was Alianza Lima, their first title in 19 years.

qa.question: which has the 3rd most national titles of the team located in the city of Lima ?
